comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called The Society of Social Documentary Photographers , and we'd love to have this added to the group! wonderful
comment.authorname: Paul van der Meer - Photo's (More off than on)

comment.author: 39722514@N06
comment._content: Notice the meal is of moderate proportions, with a good sized dessert and milk as the beverage.  No fried foods, no soda (you had to sneak into the teacher's lounge to get a soda!).  No wonder we were in better shape (we also had mandatory 'recess' in elementary, where we actually played vigorous games daily, and PE in Jr High and High School).
